mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sum(al.pv) AS pv, sum(al.uv) AS uv, al.accesstime, al.startTime, al.endTime, al.platform_id , pl.`name` platformName FROM access_log al LEFT JOIN goods_url g ON al.goods_url_id = g.id LEFT JOIN product p ON g.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN platform pl ON al.platform_id = pl.id WHERE CONCAT( al.startTime, '-', al.endTime ) != '00:00:00-23:59:59' AND DATE_FORMAT(al.accesstime, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{days} GROUP BY al.platform_id, al.startTime, al.endTime;

SELECT DISTINCT sum(al.pv) AS pv, sum(al.uv) AS uv, al.accesstime, al.startTime, al.endTime, al.platform_id, pl.`name` platformName FROM access_log al LEFT JOIN goods_url g ON al.goods_url_id = g.id LEFT JOIN product p ON g.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN platform pl ON al.platform_id = pl.id WHERE CONCAT( al.startTime, '-', al.endTime ) = '00:00:00-23:59:59' AND DATE_FORMAT(al.accesstime, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY al.platform_id, al.accesstime;

SELECT DISTINCT sum(al.pv) AS pv, sum(al.uv) AS uv, al.accesstime, al.startTime, al.endTime, al.platform_id, pl.`name` platformName FROM access_log al LEFT JOIN goods_url g ON al.goods_url_id = g.id LEFT JOIN product p ON g.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN platform pl ON al.platform_id = pl.id WHERE CONCAT( al.startTime, '-', al.endTime ) = '00:00:00-23:59:59' AND DATE_FORMAT(al.accesstime, '%Y-%m') = #{month} GROUP BY al.platform_id, al.accesstime;

SELECT DISTINCT sum(al.pv) AS pv, sum(al.uv) AS uv, DATE_FORMAT(al.accesstime, '%Y-%m') AS accessMonth, al.startTime, al.endTime, al.platform_id, pl.`name` platformName FROM access_log al LEFT JOIN goods_url g ON al.goods_url_id = g.id LEFT JOIN product p ON g.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN platform pl ON al.platform_id = pl.id WHERE CONCAT( al.startTime, '-', al.endTime ) = '00:00:00-23:59:59' AND DATE_FORMAT(al.accesstime, '%Y') =#{year} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(al.accesstime, '%Y-%m'), al.platform_id;
